dataloader(path)

class BayesClusterTrainer[source]

BayesClusterTrainer(space, cost_fn_params, embeddings, labels, *args, **kwargs)

A simple wrapper for cluster optimization with hyperopt

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

example:

{% raw %} 
space = {'some_param': range(10)}
cost_fn_param = {'a':0.3, 'b': 0.7}
emb = np.random.randn(32, 768)
labels = np.random.randint(0,1,32)

trainer = BayesClusterTrainer(space, cost_fn_param, emb, labels)
trainer.train()
